channel.title: First day as king vote immune
channel.description:
was princess, died n1, revived n2. became king n3. apparently i might have been converted so they executed me.
this court just keeps killing all their kings.
I propose king being immune to votes first day of his reign.

item.title: First day as king vote immune
item.dc:creator: Braixen
item.description:
I disagree seeing as though a unseen member would mostly always try to become king.

Read full topic
item.source: First day as king vote immune

item.title: First day as king vote immune
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
This post was salt driven, I saw what you said afterwards.

The initial King’s vote immunity is enough. If people suspect you to be converted, then you’ve got to convince them otherwise, or don’t step up as King.

RopeStringFace:

I am sad when I get king as class.

Why’d you even step up if you don’t want to be King if you don’t like it?

RopeStringFace:

It needs more buffs.

Initial King is immune to votes for 3 days.
Guards.
Point Finger.
Decide Fate.
Occupy Immune.

Buffs? What buffs?

Read full topic
item.source: First day as king vote immune

item.title: First day as king vote immune
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
additionally, @ThePlex if someone was truly vote up worthy, then someone would have contested their running and have a vote.

Read full topic
item.source: First day as king vote immune

item.title: First day as king vote immune
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

Nope. Disagree. 100% disagree.
The only reason the initial King is vote immune is because nobody truly knows their alignment.

(died n1, was princess)
(revived n2)
(day 4 be king)

get executed because

  1. I “might have been converted”
  2. everyone who thought I was good was to passive to pardon.

I couldn’t do anything as king to save myself.

King is a class that really quite sucks. You would think king would be an envied class; it is not. I am sad when I get king as class.

It needs more buffs.

Read full topic
item.source: First day as king vote immune
